marker.ph:
<<Grid> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="20"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="20"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="20"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="20"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<TextBox x:Name="TopTextBox" Style="{StaticResource TextBoxStyle}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="1" Grid.ColumnSpan="4"/> <TextBox x:Name="BottomTextBox" Style="{StaticResource TextBoxStyle}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="2" Grid.ColumnSpan="4" Margin="0, 0, 0, 5"/>
<Button Content="" x:Name="BlankButton" Style="{StaticResource LeftButton}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="3"/> <Button Content="√" x:Name="SqrRootButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="3"/> <Button Content="x^2" x:Name="SqrButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="3"/> <Button Content="1/x" x:Name="InverseButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="3"/>
<Button Content="^" x:Name="CaretButton" Style="{StaticResource LeftButton}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="4"/> <Button Content="Clear" x:Name="ClearButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="4"/> <Button Content="Back" x:Name="BackButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="4"/> <Button Content="/" x:Name="DivideButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="4"/>
<Button Content="7" x:Name="SevenButton" Style="{StaticResource LeftButton}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="5"/> <Button Content="8" x:Name="EightButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="5"/> <Button Content="8" x:Name="NineButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="5"/> <Button Content="*" x:Name="MultiplyButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="5"/>
<Button Content="4" x:Name="FourButton" Style="{StaticResource LeftButton}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="6"/> <Button Content="5" x:Name="FiveButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="6"/> <Button Content="6" x:Name="SixButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="6"/> <Button Content="-" x:Name="MinusButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="6"/>
<Button Content="1" x:Name="OneButton" Style="{StaticResource LeftButton}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="7"/> <Button Content="2" x:Name="TwoButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="7"/> <Button Content="3" x:Name="ThreeButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="7"/> <Button Content="+" x:Name="PlusButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="7"/>
<Button Content="+/-" x:Name="SwitchSignButton" Style="{StaticResource LeftButton}" Grid.Column="1" Grid.Row="8"/> <Button Content="0" x:Name="ZeroButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="8"/> <Button Content="." x:Name="DecimalButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="8"/> <Button Content="=" x:Name="EqualsButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="8"/> </Grid>.../>

<<Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="20"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="20"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="20"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <Button Content="0" x:Name="ZeroButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="8"/> <Button Content="." x:Name="DecimalButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="3" Grid.Row="8"/> <Button Content="=" x:Name="EqualsButton" Style="{StaticResource Button}" Grid.Column="4" Grid.Row="8"/>.../>

<<Style TargetType="Button" x:Key="Button"> <EventSetter Event="MouseEnter" Handler="Button_OnHover"/> <EventSetter Event="MouseLeave" Handler=""></EventSetter> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black"/> <Setter Property="Width" Value="72"/> <Setter Property="Height" Value="66.66"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="1.5, 1.5, 1.5, 1.5"/> </Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox" x:Key="TextBoxStyle"> <Setter Property="Width" Value="295"/> <Setter Property="Height" Value="50"></Setter> </Style>.../>

<<EventSetter Event="MouseEnter" Handler="Button_OnHover"/> <EventSetter Event="MouseLeave" Handler=""></EventSetter> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="Black"/> <Setter Property="Width" Value="72"/> <Setter Property="Height" Value="66.66"/> <Setter Property="Margin" Value="1.5, 1.5, 1.5, 1.5"/>.../>
